title: Trump Tweetstorm Calls for 'Great Wall,' Slams Democrats on Border
content:
President Donald Trump continued his call for a `` Great Wall '' at the border with Mexico on Tuesday morning , claiming Democrats want open borders rather than security and threatening to have the U.S. military build the wall if Democrats block funding .
Trump pressed his case in a five-part message on Twitter , posted ahead of his meeting with Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer , D-N.Y. , and House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi , D-Calif .
A combination of newly built walls , the Border Patrol , ICE , and the military have done a `` fantastic '' job , Trump said , but more is needed .
`` Despite the large Caravans that WERE forming and heading to our Country , people have not been able to get through our newly built Walls , makeshift Walls & Fences , or Border Patrol Officers & Military , '' Trump said . `` They are now staying in Mexico or going back to their original countries . ''
`` Ice , Border Patrol and our Military have done a FANTASTIC job of securing our Southern Border , '' he continued . `` A Great Wall would be , however , a far easier & less expensive solution . We have already built large new sections & fully renovated others , making them like new . ''
Democrats , however , `` for strictly political reasons and because they have been pulled so far left , do NOT want Border Security . They want Open Borders for anyone to come in , '' Trump tweeted . `` This brings large scale crime and disease . Our Southern Border is now Secure and will remain that way . ''
He added he was looking forward to meeting with Schumer and Pelosi , but `` in 2006 , Democrats voted for a Wall , and they were right to do so , '' he said . `` Today , they no longer want Border Security . They will fight it at all cost , and Nancy must get votes for Speaker . But the Wall will get built . ''
`` People do not yet realize how much of the Wall , including really effective renovation , has already been built , '' Trump said . `` If the Democrats do not give us the votes to secure our Country , the Military will build the remaining sections of the Wall . They know how important it is ! ''
He followed up with another tweet praising Michael Anton , a former senior national security official from the Trump administration , for a `` great job '' after he had appeared on Fox News ' `` Fox and Friends '' around the time Trump was tweeting his messages .
During Anton 's appearance , show co-host Brian Kilmeade asked him if Trump has any leverage over Pelosi and Schumer , and he replied the `` American people 's public opinion '' was on his side .

The wall restorations have also been effective, he tweeted.
